attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MY 93 YEAR OLD MOTHER WAS RECENTLY ADMITTED TO A CARE HOME.  I HAVE LOOKED AFTER HER, AND MY FATHER BEFORE HER, FOR 30 YEARS.  THE HOUSE IS SPLIT 50-50 AND NOW THE PENSIONS DEPT HAVE TAKEN AWAY HER PENSION CREDIT AS IT IS DEEMED MY MOTHER HAS £90,000 SAVINGS AND INVESTMENTS WHICH IS HALF THE VALUE OF THE HOME I LIVE IN.  I AM CURRENTLY PAYING £300+ PER MONTH, MY MOTHER HAS NO MONEY TO PAY FOR INCIDENTALS AND I AM PAYING FOR HAIRDRESSING, CHIROPODY ETC.  WHAT A LOUSY GOVERNMENT THIS IS THAT CAN FIND MONEY TO FIGHT WARS, GIVE HANDOUTS TO THE LAZY, BUT CANNOT LOOK AFTER THE OLD PEOPLE, AND PARTICULARLY THEIR CHILDREN WHO ARE PAYING THE COST.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
